body:
Comment 2: 
I have been trying for 2 days, but can't narrow it down. The crash point changes like
every day, so it's hard to pin-point, and the crash doesn't come from a specific place
in my code.

The only constant is that the crash disappears once I disabled PreciseGC.

If it will help, I can build and privately share my the application binaries (both the
app and the datastore), so you can reproduce in-house.
